comment: create view with select * from authoritative table

Instructions.Query: create view view_a as select user_id, col1, col2 from authoritative

comment: create view with select * from join of authoritative tables
query: create view user.view_a as select * from authoritative a join authoritative b on a.user_id=b.user_id

plan.Original: create view user.view_a as select * from authoritative a join authoritative b on a.user_id=b.user_id

Instructions.Query: create view view_a as select a.user_id as user_id, a.col1 as col1, a.col2 as col2, b.user_id as user_id, b.col1 as col1, b.col2 as col2 from authoritative as a join authoritative as b on a.user_id = b.user_id

Instructions.Query: create view view_a as select `user`.id, a.user_id as user_id, a.col1 as col1, a.col2 as col2, `user`.col1 from authoritative as a join `user` on a.user_id = `user`.id
